Articles.Content: I know its a small thing, and I'm sure a skilled modder could pop this out in no time, but I'm not that person, I love the different map icons that represent your ships, rovers and stations, etc. But I'd love to see a new one added, a plane icon, so you could designate a craft a plane, and visually tell, that craft in orbit is a space plane, versus a rocket, or that craft I have landed in the grass lands is a plane, not a rocket capsule waiting to be recovered. Its a small thing, and maybe silly, but to me, its just a small thing I obsess over.
A simple idea, but still a good one. I may be unaware of some details, but it doesn't seem like it would be too hard for someone to convert the little ribbon generator plane icon for use in KSP.

I'd also love a dot that you can colour-code, for example I have a Mun base, with a central craft as the actual base, and the different colours can be classed as different module uses.

The plane idea is probably the best thing I've heard all week month. I'd love to see this happen.

Edit: It's only Tuesday, that seems a little unfair.
